titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that previously authorized construction to improve medical facilities administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs should not be delayed by the national health care reform debate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.

bill.summary: 11/18/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that construction on projects to build, renovate, or otherwise improve Department of Veterans Affairs medical facilities should not be delayed during the current national health reform debate if such projects have already been authorized by the Congress.
